primary_type.title: Primary dither pattern type
primary_type.description: NIRCam primary dither pattern type. Possible values when NIRCam is the only operating instrument, or Imaging prime with MIRI Imaging, NIRCam Imaging, or NIRISS WFSS in parallel, are: FULL, FULLBOX, INTRAMODULE, INTRAMODULEBOX, INTRAMODULEX, INTRASCA, SUBARRAY_DITHER, NONE. When NIRCam Engineering Imaging is prime with FGS External Calibration in parallel, possible values are the same plus WFSC. When NIRCam WFSS is prime with either MIRI Imaging or NIRISS Imaging in parallel, the possible values are only: INTRAMODULE, INTRAMODULEBOX, INTRAMODULEX, NONE.

primary_dither_type.title: Primary dither points and packing
primary_dither_type.description: Primary dither specification with number of points and possible point packing. When NIRCam is the only instrument in operation, values are: 3TIGHT, 3, 6, 9, 15, 21, 27, 36, 45 (FULL); 2TIGHTGAPS, 3TIGHTGAPS, 4TIGHT, 4, 5TIGHT, 6TIGHT, 6, 8NIRSPEC (FULLBOX); 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 16 (INTRAMODULE); 2-16 (INTRAMODULEBOX, INTRAMODULEX); 2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 9, 13, 17, 25 (INTRASCA); 2, 3, 4 (SUBARRAY_DITHER). Subsets of these values are available when NIRCam is imaging with MIRI or NIRISS in parallel. When NIRCam is in WFSS mode (alone or with MIRI or NIRISS in parallel), the only possible values are integers 2-16. When NIRCam in engineering imaging (alone or with FGS in parallel), all values plus WFSC values (1, 2PLUS, 2MINUS) are possible.

primary_points.title: Number of points in primary dither pattern
primary_points.description: Number of points in NIRCam primary dither pattern, extracted from PRIDTYPE. Possible values are: 1-17, 21, 25, 27, 36, 45.

subpixel_pattern.title: Subpixel dither pattern type
subpixel_pattern.description: NIRCam subpixel dither pattern type. When NIRCam is the only instrument in operation the possible values are limited to STANDARD and SMALL_GRID_DITHER. When NIRCam is prime with MIRI or NIRISS in parallel, many more types are available, such as NIRCAM_ONLY, NONE, #_POINT, #_POINT_WITH_MIRI_<MIRI filter>, and #_POINT_<SMALL|MEDIUM|LARGE>_WITH_NIRISSR (where # is the number of subpixel dither points).

subpixel_total_points.title: Number of points in subpixel dither pattern
subpixel_total_points.description: Number of points in the NIRCam subpixel dither pattern. When NIRCam is the only instrument operating possible values are 1-9, 12, 16, 20, 24, 30, 36, 48, 64. When NIRCam is prime with FGS, MIRI, or NIRISS in parallel, a more limited set of those options are allowed.

pattern_size.title: Primary dither pattern size
pattern_size.description: NIRCam dither pattern size indicates the dither point distribution for INTRASCA pattern type. It is N/A when NIRCam Imaging is prime with MIRI Imaging in parallel and when NIRCam WFSS is prime with NIRISS Imaging in parallel.

small_grid_pattern.title: Name of small grid dither pattern
small_grid_pattern.description: Name of the small grid dither pattern for NIRCam Coronagraphic Imaging and Engineering Imaging only
small_grid_pattern.misc: NIRCam Coronagraphic Imaging and Engineering Imaging only

dither_points.title: Number of points in direct image dither pattern
dither_points.description: NIRISS direct image dither number of points, included when a NIRCam Imaging dither is in parallel with NIRISS WFSS and pattern type is WFSS. Possible values are: 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 9, 12, 16.
dither_points.misc: for NIRISS WFSS/NIRCam Imaging dither; set by SDP to dms_dithers_view.image_dither_number_of_points for NIRISS
